name: Escape Hellfire
description:
Hi,

I have created this game within 1.5 weeks in the course of the NESJam. This is my first game that I have ever completed entirely and for the most part all by myself, including the creation of all the resources from scratch.

I apologize for any errors you may be encountering while playing the game - I still had a lot of ideas for the game and a lot of things to improve, but due to time constraint I had to finish and upload it. Hope you enjoy it!
